transcript:
Customer: Hello? Ji sir.
Executive: Hello? Ji sir.
Customer: Achha, main aapko ye image jab bhejunga na, toh whatsapp ke medium mein problem kya hoti hai ki whatsapp compress kar deta hai image ko.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Yaani image distort ho jaati hai. Toh ek ye cheez rahega aur ek problem aur rahega yadi maan lo ki main aapko by mail bhejta hu ya kahin bhi bhejta hu jo original jo image hai, theek hai?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Toh yadi aap usko compress karoge na, toh distort kar doge toh woh dikhayegi kyunki usko pata hi nahi chalega aapka jo mechanism IndiaMART kya hai usko pata nahi chalega ki contact ka detail hai ki kya hai. Jab neat and clean image hoti hai na, jaise hum log kya ki jab bhi product ka photographies karte hai na toh hum log ye khas dhyan rakhte hai. Sabse pehle hum log mockups banate hai uske baad uski photography hoti hai. Toh hum ye dhyan rakhte hai ki uska compress image compress nahi ho jaaye. Yadi hum kitna bhi usko bada kare na, toh woh distorted nahi ho.
Toh ye yadi aapki yadi main aapko photo original bhi bhej dunga na lekin yadi koi cheez ko compress karta hai na toh woh upload toh ho jaayegi. Kyunki aapke jo mechanism hai na IndiaMART ka woh AI based hai, theek hai? Toh usko ye pata hi nahi chal paayega ki ye kaunsi wali detail hai. Dikkat kahaan pe aati jaati hai ki jab main original image upload karne jaaunga na toh mere ko bahut pareshani aati. Aap main aapko image bhej raha hu aap ek baar dekh lijiye, theek hai? Yadi aisi koi dikkat aati hai toh let's we will see later on, theek hai? Theek hai, theek hai aap please ek baar dekh lijiye.
Executive: Ek baar bataiye.
Customer: Mere ko ye problem toh aati hi hai ye isliye hai lekin ye hai ki mujhe pata hai main hamesha woh karta hu na images ke bare mein ki hum log jab images banate hai design banate hai toh ye dikkat bahut aati hai humko.
Executive: Ji, ji.
Customer: Toh I just send the images aap ek baar dekh lijiye fir we will see later on, theek hai sir ji.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai sir. Okay ji, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Image gets compressed on WhatsApp.

- Original image upload causes problems.



Resolution:

- Customer sent the image for review.



Next Steps: 

- Will see later on.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- image, whatsapp, compress, ai
